entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Task.Delay(1000, stoppingToken)` does not throw a `TaskCanceledException` from a the `ExecuteAsync` method of a `BackgroundService` #112971
  • [API Proposal]: extend 'Attribute' model for feature APIs for custom feature switches #112969
  • System.Text.Json causes duplicate fields for overridden members #112967
  • [browser] failing blittable tests - src\tests\Interop\Interop.csproj #112963
    Future
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #112962
  • Improve allocateRegisters() and allocateRegistersMinimal() by representing and accessing local register sets in a more efficient manner #112961
  • Improve LSRA to handle more than 64 registers for x64 #112959
    10.0.0
  • Static cctor won't be called before executing DllImport in AOT-compiled code (Mono) #112958
  • [Performance improvement] Minimize number of properties placed in the runtimeconfig.json file #112956
  • JIT can't elide span.Slice range checks after a manual check #112953
    Future
  • [Android] System.Collections.Immutable tests timeout on android-arm and android-x86 #112948
  • [Android] System.Tests.RandomTests.Next_IntInt_Next_IntInt_AllValuesAreWithinRange failing on android-arm #112946
  • Consider adding `IBufferWriter<byte>` overloads to `JsonSerializer` #112943
    10.0.0

Closed

  • InterpreterFrame.SaveTraceToException publishes a private type #39433
  • [API Proposal]: More `MemoryExtension` methods accepting `SearchValues<T>` #109859
    Future
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.ConvertTests.ConvertChecked test failure #112755
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 1/18/2024 8:54:27 PM #97404
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler - expose buffer and reset #110505
    10.0.0
  • [Question] JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester fail with DOTNET_TieredCompilation=0 on Linux #104451
    10.0.0
  • Improve `allocateRegisters()` and `allocateRegistersMinimal()` by representing and accessing local register sets in a more efficient manner #112960
  • .NET TP Worker: segfault on Linux #112910
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.1.25103.13] Some apps retarget failed with CS0121 and CS0428 System.Linq errors #112462
    10.0.0
  • gcstress failures on arm64 #111192
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Codegen should unset register assignments after defining nodes that will be used from spill temps #105837
    10.0.0
  • JIT: More elaborate store forwarding patterns with physical promotion #86665
    10.0.0
  • System.Tests.GCTests.GetGCMemoryInfo test failed in CI #29434
  • NumberDecimalSeparator and possibly other IFormatProvider options aren't working on WinUI #31197
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.PreserializedResourceWriterTests #34495
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #34753
  • Expose DATAS mode in GCSettings #111774
  • ### **Title:** Missing `KeySize` Reading Access in `RSACertificateExtensions.GetRSAPrivateKey` on Linux (.NET 9) #112622
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update GC bridge debugging code #112970
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: give inlinees their own EH table #112968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area owners for hosting #112966
    area-Meta
  • Test - Please ignore #112965
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Add trim to FileInfo (issue #70524) #112964
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix exception propagation from managed to native on Unix #112957
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • using major version in tfm #112955
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid unnecessary write backs during physical promotion #112949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Generate boot config as javascript module #112947
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • arm64: Add return cases into optimise bools #112945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Combine cast => negate => compare on ARM64 #112944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Enable Android CoreCLR and device startup testing #112939
    area-Infrastructure
  • [android] Make Android app on coreclr use host-runtime contract and provide external assembly probe #112938
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow R2R for images provided via external_assembly_probe #112934
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add approved TensorPrimitives surface area #112933
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Add MemoryExtensions.CountAny/ReplaceAny #112951
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Move local thread pool work items to global by default when blocking on a task #112796
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112793
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Add DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text/Clear #112171
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reapply "Use rangecheck in assertprop (#112766)" (#112872) #112907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip validation of debug info mappings in optimized codegen #112942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112531
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.4
  • [Android] Use lowered runtime flavor in Android sample app MakeFile #112940
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • add follow-up assert during unwinding #112817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump net10 downlevel versions to n-1 #112805
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Contains for Distinct/Union with custom comparer #112815
    area-System.Linq
  • Only count DwarfDump errors produced by managed code #112813
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete old parameter ABI classification #112884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable GC stress tests for the interpreter test #112906
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Pass SourceBuiltPdbArtifactsDir parameteres to runtime build #112788
    needs-area-label
  • Temporary hotfix for interpreter crash #112920
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add fallback for `notifyInstructionSetUsage` #112925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consolidate guid definitions #112826
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Zero-diff part of "Use SSA-based ComputeRange" #112853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Differentiate `MethodTable`s that are/aren't visible to reflection #112782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Publish dotnet/runtime using standard Arcade Publish tooling #111934
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] testing #112909
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents to runtime shared framework #112930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement void AsnWriter.Encode #112921
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [PERF] all build jobs used for performance testing are now possible to run inividually #112902
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • [browser] add and load empty ES6 module dotnet.diag.js when FeaturePerfTracing #112787
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • testing CI - GC trace #112696
    area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Enabling CI for APX #112667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support disassembling single file bundle for ILSpy #112541
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement core stackwalking #111759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [infra] Add runtime-extra-platforms to build analysis #112851
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112878
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` #112864
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `WasmFingerprintDotnetJs` tests and add `WriteImportMapToHtml` tests #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConverter` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary _DARWIN_C_SOURCE definition in CMake files #112141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use osx.13.arm64.open queue for osx testing #112647
    needs-area-label
  • Enable CoreCLR/tvOS build #111804
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    needs-area-label
  • arm64: Set zero flag for more comparisons #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support bitwise field extractions from parameter registers #112740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JsonIgnore behavior on init-only properties in source generation mode #112924
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove a few unsafe bits in BCL #111643
    area-Meta
  • Modify buffer overflow logic for System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.ReturnBufferWhenFullFiresDroppedDiagnosticEvent #112849
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Document NDK upgrade process #112885
    documentation, needs-area-label
  • Move UMEntryThunk to StubPrecode infrastructure #112460
    area-VM-coreclr
